modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds radiation signs to the wasteland and radiation zone. If you come across a rad zone sign there might be radiation.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds radiation signs to the wasteland and radiation zone. Because the game combines the two biomes, it is not possible to only put rad zones in the wasteland. However, in theory, if you come across a rad zone sign where it doesn’t belong, there might be radiation.

[Download](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=Guppycur%27s_Rad_Warning_Signs)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/)
